org.sensorhub.api.persistence

Interface IProcedureStorage<ConfigType extends StorageConfig>

  • Type Parameters:
    ConfigType - Configuration class
    All Superinterfaces:
    IEventProducer, IModule<ConfigType>, IStorageModule<ConfigType>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemorySensorStorage

    public interface IProcedureStorage<ConfigType extends StorageConfig>
extends IStorageModule<ConfigType>

    Base interface for all sensor description storage implementations

    Copyright (c) 2014

    Since:
    March 1, 2014
    Author:
    Alexandre Robin
